service_clients_audit.recommendation: Remove with 'apt remove --purge telnet -y' and disable it using 'systemctl disable telnet'.
Remove with 'apt remove --purge ldap-utils -y' and disable it using 'systemctl disable ldap-utils'.

service_clients_audit.check: Ensure nonessential services are removed or masked
service_clients_audit.recommendation: Review all running services using 'systemctl list-units --type=service' and mask any unnecessary services using 'systemctl mask <service>'.
